features: High Data Transfer Speed - With read speeds up to 90MB/s, Hephinov USB 3.0 Flash Drive offers you a nice experience of everyday fast data/files transfer. (Based on internal test condition of Hephinov, actual speed may vary with different host devices and environments.)

Plug and Play - no need to install any software, just simple plug into the USB port of computer or other devices and use it! And the memory stick supports any systems, such as: Windows 98second edition/ NT/ ME/ 2000/ XP/ 7/ 8.1/ 10 and above, and Linux and Mac OS 10.3 and above;

Practical and Portable - Hephinov USB 3.0 pen drive is compatible with USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 ports. Adopt UDP technology, Hephinov USB 3.0 Flash Drive features tiny and seamless outlook with durable and rugged metal Zinc alloy casing.

Safe and Reliable – With Hephinov owned international standard storage technology of shockproof, waterproof, magnet proof, temperature proof (operating range is between 0° C and 60° C), and x-ray proof.
Package And Warranty : 1 PCS Hephinov 32GB Metal USB 3.0 Flash Drive comes; The USB Stick is backed by a 2-year warranty
body.description: Hephinov USB 3.0 Flash Drive 32GB Mini Size and High Speed Transfer Technology Hephinov USB3.0 Flash Drive adopts to UDP technology, which makes our flash drive in such a mini size. Durable and Reliable This stylish and classic all-metal design USB flash drive is not only sturdy and durable, but also provides better convenience for storing and transferring sharing, photos, videos, and files; Convenient As for pocket size and reserved lanyard hole design, it is easy and convenient to carry. Hephinov USB flash drive meets your portable demands anytime anywhere if any devices with USB slots can be accessed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hephinov Metal USB 3.0 FLASH DRIVE 32G Hephinov Ultre Speed Data Transfer USB3.0 32G Jumpdriver High Data Transfer Speed: USB 3.0 flash drive with read transfer speeds up to 90MB/s. This flash drive is backward compatible with USB 3.0 devices and can be compatible with more devices to achieve high-speed transfer performance, such as, PC, Laptop, TV, Car, Audio and etc;

High Speed Transfer USB 3.0 interface with read speed up to 90 MB/s. Save your time on waiting data transfer, spend more time on enjoy your life, concentrate yourself with important work content, improve efficiency. Wide Compatibility Hephinov USB pen drive support TV, desktop, notebook computer, car, audio and other device. It is your great data storage and transfer companion with traveling and working. Easy to Plug and Play Easy to use, just plug it into your USB interface, now start your entertainment and work with Hephinov JumpDrive. It supports Windows and IOS operation system and multiple types of file including videos, music, documents and other file. Safe and Endurance Premium full capacity chip, high quality electronic component , together make Hephinov USB stick durable and never worry about losing your data.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great thumb drive
reviews.reviewText: This is a great thumb drive for a great price. It works perfectly and I have had no issues with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and works
reviews.reviewText: Compact and fits on key chain no problem so far

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overdue, much needed product
reviews.reviewText: 64 gb for a great price! I purchased this USB for my TV. For a while I've gotten a "low memory" message on my TV when I go to download a new app. Not sure why I waited so long, but this has solved my low memory problems!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars very small easy to loose but....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pen drive de buena capacidad. Bien embalado.Llego antes del tiempo indicado

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars First case bent, the 2nd USB Flash Drive worked one time
reviews.reviewText: I formatted the drive the first time it recognized it on the laptop....after saving one file it failed to open on three different devices. I told Amazon I wanted my under $5 refund withoutout a return since it did have personal information on it. These products only work sometimes and returning one is crazy, but the rewards to someone else if they could access the data is huge. Not worth buying from anyone that is not USA or named Brand that typically work for a very long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used this drive to port files to my 3d printer and also to install operating systems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If it holds data with no corruption it should prove to be very valuable.
